title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8187 - Informational Hearings, Adjudicatory Proceedings And Review Proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8187 - Informational Hearings, Adjudicatory Proceedings And Review Proceedings

State Regulations

Subpart 8187-1 - Adjudicatory Hearing Procedures (§ 8187-1.1 to 8187-1.13)

Subpart 8187-2 - Review Of County Equalizations (§ 8187-2.1 to 8187-2.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8187

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 204, 208, 216, 504, 816

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
